metadata.title: CVE-2021-41688 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: DCMTK through 3.6.6 does not handle memory free properly. The object in the program is free but its address is still used in other locations. Sending specific requests to the dcmqrdb program will incur a double free. An attacker can use it to launch a DoS attack.

criterions.comment: dcmtk package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
